channel.title: About on S. M. Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in About on S. M. Hasan

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am S. Mahmudul Hasan, a first-year Ph.D. student in Computer Science at Tulane University, working with Prof. Lu Peng on AI, systems, and edge devices. I hold an M.S. from Syracuse University (2024), with research in security, privacy, and usable security, and a B.Sc. from BUET (2018). Prior to my Ph.D., I taught as a Lecturer at the Canadian University of Bangladesh and Eastern University.

item.title: Education
item.description:
• Ph.D. in Computer Science, Tulane University, expected 2029
  • M.Sc. in Computer Science, Syracuse University, 2024
  • B.Sc. in Software Engineering, Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology, 2018

item.title: Awards & Honors
item.description: • Best Paper Award, 18th Intl. Workshop on Search-Based and Fuzz Testing (SBFT 2025), co-located with IEEE/ACM ICSE 2025
